meanings.definition: To make smaller or less significant in comparison.
meanings.sent1: The giant tree bedwarfing the tiny flower.
meanings.sent2: The new building is bedwarfing the old one.
meanings.sent3: The oversized hat bedwarfing his head looked quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The mountain bedwarfed by the vast sky.
meanings.sent5: The shadow of the cloud bedwarfing the small pond was a striking sight.

meanings.definition: To overshadow or diminish in size or importance.
meanings.sent1: Her loud voice bedwarfed the other sounds in the room.
meanings.sent2: The bright colors bedwarfed the dull ones.
meanings.sent3: The huge cake bedwarfing the tiny cupcakes made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His achievements bedwarfed by his brother's success.
meanings.sent5: The grand castle bedwarfing the small village was a sight to behold.
